channel.title: Need help with hosting server!
channel.description: What system requirements should I have and what kind of router and all that stuff.. Keep in mind I will have windows vista no matter what. Tell me how much gb on hard drive i should get and ram and what kind of router and etc i would need to host a server with almost 100 ppl no lag.

item.title: Need help with hosting server!
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:

Theres better grades of it, check with ur ISP to see what they have available

what do you mean better internet ? there’s better internet then broad band :S?

item.title: Need help with hosting server!
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

heh. I recommend gettin-At least broadband/dsl but i guarantee u will need somethin way better than that if u want no-lag.
ROuter-Really doesnt matter, i prefer Linksys tho.
Ram/memory-i recommend 2-4gb of ram
processor-at least 2.5 Mhz, i recommend mab around 3 Mhz
hardrive…u wont need to upgrade…the server should only take not even 1 gb…but it depends on how many people sign on to it/how many characetrs files theyre are

Read full topic
